page.title: 10Biography of people in Rhos
page.content: The following people are associated with the village. Rosemary Frankland In 1968 she became Miss World. Meredith Edwards He was a famous actor on stage,television,radio and in films.He now lives in Cilcaen,Clwyd. Tom Ellis He is the MP for the Wrexham Constituency. After losing the election of 1982 he was elected for the European parliment. Colin Jones He is the conductor of the Rhos Male Voice Choir. J.G.Williams He is the conductor of the Orpheus Male Voice Choir. Sir Brynmor Jones Is the vice chancellor of Hull university.
